meanings.sent1: She counted the totalities of apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: The totalities of books on the shelf overwhelmed her.
meanings.sent3: The totalities of candies in the jar seemed to be never-ending.

meanings.sent5: The totalities of stars in the night sky took her breath away.
